events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the software engineer position, highlighting strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application was reviewed and categorized under Engineering, specifically targeting software development roles within our team.
Assigned a recruiter specialized in engineering hires to manage the candidate's process and prepare for the next steps.
Completed the initial screening call; candidate demonstrated solid knowledge in software architecture and problem-solving skills.
Received the candidateâ€™s prompt reply confirming availability for technical interview and enthusiasm for the role.
Scheduled the technical interview with the engineering panel for next week to evaluate coding skills and system design.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showcasing strong coding ability and effective communication under pressure.
Arranged the HR interview to discuss company culture fit, benefits, and next steps in the recruitment process.
Candidate completed the HR interview expressing alignment with company values and enthusiasm about the team environment.
An offer was extended to the candidate including competitive salary and benefits tailored to their experience and expectations.
The candidate responded positively to the offer with a few questions about the remote work policy and career growth opportunities.
Candidate formally accepted the offer, expressing excitement to join the engineering team and contribute to upcoming projects.
The onboarding process was initiated with orientation sessions scheduled, access credentials provided, and team introductions planned.
The hiring process was successfully closed; the new software engineer was officially integrated into the team and began work.
